A4.text: On 6 June 2013, Brazil was ranked 22nd in the FIFA World Rankings, their lowest ever.

A5.text: As of November 2025, Argentina ranks 2nd in the FIFA Men's World Ranking.

A6.text: Spain is the second nation to hold the first position in both men and women's rankings simultaneously since September 2025, after Germany.
